name: Treesweater
description: The world-famous treesweater! Make a wee little sweater for your favorite tree. Show it you care. Spread a little love. Make some people smile, and other people very angry for no apparent reason. (Oh, like THEY don’t waste time!)
full_text: The world-famous treesweater! Make a wee little sweater for your favorite tree. Show it you care. Spread a little love. Make some people smile, and other people very angry for no apparent reason. (Oh, like THEY don’t waste time!)
